scripts.start: npm run dist && npm run watch & live-server dist
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:scss & npm run watch:html
scripts.build: npm run dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R src/assets src/libs src/index.html dist
scripts.scss: node-sass --source-map-embed src/scss/index.scss dist/main.css && npm run postcss
